outputs.output_descr:
1. AIDS mainstreamed in the work and core mandates of regional organizations and entities
2.Governance of AIDS responses at the regional and sub-regional level coordinated
3. HIV Legislation and Policy strengthened
4. Gender dimensions or national and regional AIDS strategies strengthened
5. Regional partnerships amongst MSM strengthened
6. Trade, health and IP legislation for sustainable access to ARVs enabled

project_descr: ACCELERATING EFFORTS TO ACHIEVE UNIVERSAL ACCESS TO HIV/AIDS PREVENTION, CARE AND TREATMENT IN SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA
project_title: Mitigation of HIV/AIDS Impact in Sub-Saharan Africa
